top_stories.title: Neo4j Launches Infinigraph for 100TB+ Unified Graph Workloads
top_stories.description: Neo4j has launched a graph database built to unify workloads at 100TB+ scale for generative AI. The post Neo4j Launches Infinigraph for 100TB+ Unified Graph Workloads appeared first on Analytics India Magazine.
top_stories.author: Ankush Das
top_stories.content: Neo4j has launched a graph database built to unify workloads at 100TB+ scale for generative AI. The post Neo4j Launches Infinigraph for 100TB+ Unified Graph Workloads appeared first on Analytics India Magazine.

top_stories.title: Empowering air quality research with secure, ML-driven predictive analytics
top_stories.description: In this post, we provide a data imputation solution using Amazon SageMaker AI, AWS Lambda, and AWS Step Functions. This solution is designed for environmental analysts, public health officials, and business intelligence professionals who need reliable PM2.5 data for trend analysis, reporting, and decision-making. We sourced our sample training dataset from openAFRICA. Our solution predicts PM2.5 values using time-series forecasting.
top_stories.author: Nehal Sangoi
top_stories.content: In this post, we provide a data imputation solution using Amazon SageMaker AI, AWS Lambda, and AWS Step Functions. This solution is designed for environmental analysts, public health officials, and business intelligence professionals who need reliable PM2.5 data for trend analysis, reporting, and decision-making. We sourced our sample training dataset from openAFRICA. Our solution predicts PM2.5 values using time-series forecasting.

top_stories.title: It’s the Humidity: How International Researchers in Poland, Deep Learning and NVIDIA GPUs Could Change the Forecast
top_stories.description: For more than a century, meteorologists have chased storms with chalkboards, equations, and now, supercomputers. But for all the progress, they still stumble over one deceptively simple ingredient: water vapor. Humidity is the invisible fuel for thunderstorms, flash floods, and hurricanes. It’s the difference between a passing sprinkle and a summer downpour that sends you Read Article

top_stories.title: Building more helpful ChatGPT experiences for everyone
top_stories.description: We’re partnering with experts, strengthening protections for teens with parental controls, and routing sensitive conversations to reasoning models in ChatGPT.
top_stories.content: We’re partnering with experts, strengthening protections for teens with parental controls, and routing sensitive conversations to reasoning models in ChatGPT.

top_stories.title: Enhance Geospatial Analysis and GIS Workflows with Amazon Bedrock Capabilities
top_stories.description: Applying emerging technologies to the geospatial domain offers a unique opportunity to create transformative user experiences and intuitive workstreams for users and organizations to deliver on their missions and responsibilities. In this post, we explore how you can integrate existing systems with Amazon Bedrock to create new workflows to unlock efficiencies insights. This integration can benefit technical, nontechnical, and leadership roles alike.
top_stories.author: Dave Horne
